title: EA FC 24 Future Stars : release date , predictions , leaks and confirmed card design
body_text:
EA FC 24 Future Stars: confirmed release date, predictions, leaks and card design
The EA FC 24 Future Stars promo will be arriving in Ultimate Team soon, and there's tons of new content expected to be released.
The popular Future Stars Ultimate Team promo will arrive in EA FC 24 later this week, here's the confirmed release date as well as predictions and the latest leaks.
The EA FC 24 Ultimate Team content just keeps on coming in 2024, starting with the poorly-received Versus promo at the start of the month, followed by the huge TOTY promo and most recently, the RTTF promo, with the RTTF squad being released last Friday. And now, the much-loved Future Stars promo is set to launch as the next event.
Future Stars debuted in EA Sports' Ultimate Team mode back in FIFA 19, with the unique promo gifting some of the best young players in world football with heavily upgraded special items, that are supposed to be indicative of the potential these players could reach. There have been some legendary Ultimate Team items released over the years, including Erling Haaland in FIFA 20, Jude Bellingham's item in FIFA 22's Future Stars promo and Julian Alvarez's item in FIFA 23's Future Stars promo.
Here's when the EA FC 24 Future Stars promo will launch, a round-up of the latest leaks, our predictions for the squad and the confirmed card design.
READ MORE: Palworld patch notes for update v0.1.4.1 detail disappearing weapons fix and less crashingREAD MORE: Xbox Game Pass February 2024 games include one of the best Metroidvanias of the generationEA FC 24 Future Stars: confirmed release date
The EA FC 24 Future Stars release date is Friday, February 9, with EA confirming the release date via a new loading screen that appears in Ultimate Team. This date is when the RTTF squad will leave packs and Future Stars will begin. Most major EA FC 24 Ultimate Team promos launch on a Friday, including TOTY, Winter Wildcards and TOTGS amongst others.
We expect EA FC 24 Future Stars will have two promo teams, with EA FC 24 Future Stars Team 1 expected to launch on Friday, February 9 and EA FC 24 Future Stars Team 2 on Friday, February 16.
EA FC 24 Future Stars: card design
The EA FC 24 Future Stars card design has been confirmed via a new Ultimate Team loading screen, with the item featuring a purple, blue and gold design, with some silver and white featuring in the background. The loading screen also confirms the card design for Future Stars Icons. It's definitely one of the boldest and most exciting card designs we've seen in EA FC 24 Ultimate Team so far, on par with the TOTY promo.
It also appears that the PlayStyle Plus logo may also be blue to match the bottom of the item, which is a nice touch.
EA FC 24 Future Stars: leaks
As with every EA FC 24 Ultimate Team promo, several players who are set to feature have seemingly been leaked ahead of the official announcement. Here's a round-up of all the EA FC 24 Future Stars leaks we've seen so far, which come courtesy of Twitter users @FutSheriff, @UTSources, and @FUT24News:
- Alejandro Garnacho (Manchester United)
- Jeremy Doku (Manchester City)
- Arda Guler (Real Madrid)
- Harvey Elliott (Liverpool)
- Pablo Barrios (Atletico Madrid)
- Yann Aurel Bisseck (Inter)
- Lauren James (Chelsea Women)
- Castello Lukeba (RB Leipzig)
- Pedro Neto (Wolves)
- Victor Boniface (Bayer Leverkusen)
- Alejandro Balde (FC Barcelona)
- Cole Palmer (Chelsea)
- Trinity Rodman (Washington Spirit Women)
- Ronaldinho (Future Stars Icon)
- Paolo Maldini (Future Stars Icon)
- Wayne Rooney (Future Stars Icon)
- Steven Gerrard (Future Stars Icon)
- Frank Rijkaard (Future Stars Icon)
- Clarence Seedorf (Future Stars Icon)
- Andriy Shevchenko (Future Stars Icon)
- Hernan Crespo (Future Stars Icon)
- Roberto Carlos (Future Stars Icon)
- Emmanuel Petit (Future Stars Icon)
As these players have come from leaks, there's no guarantee they will feature, and we'll have to wait until EA confirms the promo squad to find out for sure.
EA FC 24 Future Stars: predictions
Here are our EA FC 24 Future Stars predictions, based purely on the players we'd like to see feature based on their performances and profile in the world of football right now.
- Kobbie Mainoo (Manchester United)
- Lewis Miley (Newcastle United)
- Warren Zaïre-Emery (Paris Saint-Germain)
- Evan Ferguson (Brighton)
- Oscar Bobb (Manchester City)
- Destiny Udogie (Tottenham Hotspur)
- Conor Bradley (Liverpool)
- Viktor Gyökeres (Sporting CP)
- Salma Paralluelo (FC Barcelona Women)
The players listed above are predicted by us and are not guaranteed to be included in the EA FC 24 Future Stars promo.
